title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5902.7 - Approval or disapproval of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5902.7 - Approval or disapproval of application

State Regulations
(a) An application, when reviewed and
accepted by the foundation staff, shall be considered by the investment review
committee, which may either reject the application or recommend the approval of
the application and transmittal thereof to the board. In either case, the CID
program manager shall promptly notify the applicant of the investment review
committee action after it has completed its review. (b) An application shall not be deemed to
have final approval until it is approved by the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5902.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
